content:
Hi!

For a few weeks spyder has been making the menu text so small to the point of being unreadable. Tonight I updated spyder in an attempt to fix this but it did not help. I would love some advice. I have attached a screenshot. spyderTextIssue.jpg
subject: Spyder Text Scaling Issue

content:
I found a SuperUser post about this issue:

https://superuser.com/questions/1473131/control-font-size-of-spyder-python-ide-on-everything-except-the-editor-code

I think the solution is to set the "custom DPI scaling" setting in the Preferences. You may need to adjust the value, depending on your desired font size.

I am attaching a screenshot.
